page.title: 19WORK AND PLAY
page.content: I am eleven years old. My grandparents and parents are hoteliers, and own a hotel. My parents, my brother and I live in a bungalow in the grounds of the hotel. I like to help in the hotel. My day starts at 7.45, when I wash, dress and have my breakfast in the kitchen before going to the hotel for my first job, washing up from the night before. I go back to the bungalow to feed and let out the chickens. Then I prepare my packed lunch before cycling to school. When school has finished I cycle home and spend some free time riding my pony for an hour and a half. My evening work is preparing the morning trays for the guests in the hotel. I set out the trays with cups, saucers, milk, sugar, tea, dried milk and a kettle. I leave the trays outside the doors of the guest rooms.
